title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 160: Featuring Rob Scuderi
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by a former teammate of both Paul and Ryan, Rob Scuderi. The guys talk about their time in Pittsburgh together, his career and what Scuds is up to now. The boys also discuss Ryan's trip to Turks and Caicos and a failed scuba attempt with his family. Then boys wrap up with some NHL news and a Gambling Corner from Rear Admiral. Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
